#### Description 

Setting Annotations Options

#### Usage

<pre><code>
hc_annotationsOptions(hc, ...)
</code></pre>

#### Arguments 

* ``hc ``: A highchart htmlwidget object.
* ``...``: Options defined in http://www.highcharts.com/plugin-registry/single/17/Annotations.
